crab.name: Crab
crab.description: Don't worry if it suddenly starts tearing off its limbs, this is normal.

diamond.name: Diamond
diamond.description: A very rare and expensive gem.

envelope.name: Envelope
envelope.description: An envelope with goodies received for reaching a new level.

fish.name: Fish
fish.description: The most common and widespread fish.

goldenFish.name: Golden fish
goldenFish.description: A very rare fish made of pure gold. It doesn't fulfill your wishes, however it's rather expensive.

octopus.name: Octopus
octopus.description: The cutest inhabitant of forest rivers

squid.name: Squid
squid.description: "Mom, look, I've catched a baby kraken!"

tropicalFish.name: Tropical fish
tropicalFish.description: By unknown means, these fish swam into the forest straight from the jungle.
